author: Special Correspondent
text:
An 11-year-old girl slipped and fell into a sump and drowned in Muni Reddy Layout, Hongasandra, in Madiwala police limits on Friday morning.

According to the police, the deceased, Prakruthi (11), was a fifth standard student in a private school. She was living with her mother Roja, a garment factory employee.

On Friday morning, she was playing in front of her house and ventured into her neighbour, Srinivas Reddy’s house. She did not notice that the sump’s lid had been removed and fell inside. The incident came to light after a couple of hours when a family member at Mr. Reddy’s house went close to the sump and saw the body. They informed her mother and the police. Mr. Reddy told the police that they had kept the sump open to check the water level. A case has been .
title: 11-year-old girl falls into sump, dies
